scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run lint && mkdir dist
scripts.build: npm run build-es && npm run build-umd
scripts.build-es: babel include-fragment-element.js -o dist/index-es.js && cp include-fragment-element.js.flow dist/index-es.js.flow
scripts.build-umd: BABEL_ENV=umd babel include-fragment-element.js -o dist/index-umd.js && cp include-fragment-element.js.flow dist/index-umd.js.flow
